source_objects.title: Food & Beverage
source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: Understanding Wine: A Totally Approachable Guide to Wine 101
items.headline: An Accessible, Fun, and Unpretentious Guide to the Basics of Wine - Presented by Sommelier Susan Connolly
objectives_summary: 1.	The most common questions in the world of wine answered!
2.	Be wine confident – increase your confidence when picking wine in restaurants, markets, and for your next dinner party with my secret to reading wine labels
3.	Easy and insightful tips for delicious food and wine pairings – including food and wine wow moments!

items.title: Learn How to Cook Low Sodium Meals with Your Air Fryer!

visible_instructors.name: Judy
visible_instructors.title: Judy Craft

items.headline: Turn your Favorite Fried Foods into Low-Sodium Dishes with these Air Fry Recipes
objectives_summary: Make Low Sodium Air Fry Dishes Your Entire Family Will Love!
Low-Sodium Air Fry Food Is Not Bland!
You Can Enjoy Your Favorite Fried Foods With Low Sodium Air Fry Recipes

items.title: All About Cookies: the crunchy and crumbly
items.headline: The ultimate cookie baking guide
objectives_summary: Learn to bake the perfect cookie the right way! With six different cookies and decorations all from scratch.
Learn all the various techniques of preparing and baking cookies.
Learn the various types of cookie dough such as the short crust pasty, biscuti dough and gingerbread.

items.title: Cooking And Kitchen Essentials: Tools For Every Home Chef

visible_instructors.job_title: Chef, author, and food blogger/critic bestfoodiespots.com
visible_instructors.title: foodiecookingschool com
visible_instructors.name: foodiecookingschool

items.headline: Teaching the foundations of the good cuisine with project based learning you can eat!
objectives_summary: You will know sanitation, how to pick good food, and how to prepare essential dishes. In sum you will have the tools needed to get day to day cooking accomplished with no fear or trepidation.

items.title: Flavor Masterclass: Start Cooking Mediterranean Food at Home

visible_instructors.job_title: Mom, former teacher, and home cook
visible_instructors.name: Jameela
visible_instructors.title: Jameela Al Jumaily

items.headline: Learn how to cook popular dishes from Iraq to Egypt and other Mediterranean countries.
objectives_summary: Cook 5 staple Iraqi dishes at home.
Mix spices to add classic flavor to Mediterranean dishes, including Persian lime, 7 spices, citric acid, and more.
Learn how to perfect cooking rice, chicken, steak, and soup.

items.title: Intensive Wagashi and Mochi Making Course
items.headline: Learn how to make wagashi (traditional Japanese sweets) with Mai, a wagashi artist based in Tokyo.
objectives_summary: Japanese cooking
How to make wagashi (4 nerikiri wagashi motifs)
How to make mochi (2 types)

items.title: INDYASSA Pastry Course #1 Gluten-Free Sponge Cake Desserts
items.headline: Learn how to make delicious cakes using soft and fluffy gluten-free sponge cakes.
objectives_summary: Become an expert at baking two different types of delightfully soft and fluffy gluten-free sponge cakes.
Learn how to make delicious cakes using the gluten-free sponge cakes.

items.title: French pastry : the real Cream puffs (Choux à la crème)
items.headline: Baking cake and pastry : All the techniques to make cream puffs you can find in the best french bakeries.
objectives_summary: Learn how to make real French cream puffs with a perfect balance of flavours.
Discover, what make the difference between a basic cream puff, and the real cream puff you can find in the shop window of French bakeries.
Learn secrets and techniques that bring up each element (dough, cream, presentation)

items.title: Discover Sourdough Cooking - The Artisan Cooking Course

visible_instructors.job_title: Artisan Baker & Owner of The Yeastie Bois Bakery
visible_instructors.name: Marceau
visible_instructors.title: Marceau Dauboin

items.headline: The Ideal Cooking Class to Master Sourdough Meals - From Baking Sourdough Pizzas to Pastas & even Artisan Burgers.
objectives_summary: How to cook world famous recipes from the comfort of your own home
How to easily create and maintain a powerful Sourdough Starter completely from scratch
Learn & Master how to use a Sourdough Starter in your everyday Cooking

items.title: Perfect Tarts and Mini Tarts. Theory and practice in details
items.headline: 5 types of shortcrust pastry in 8 recipes. Shortcrust pastry from A to Z.
objectives_summary: 5 types of shortcrust pastry in 8 recipes
10 video lessons with theory in detail; we will analyze mistakes and cooking processes explaining everything step by step.
Study online at a convenient time and anywhere in the world

items.title: Pad Thai Cooking Class Noodles Street Thai Food Easy Recipe
items.headline: Ultimate Authentic Cooking Stir-Fry Pad Thai Noodles, Traditional Popular Thai Food that you like to cook at home
objectives_summary: Learning step by step to cook Pad Thai
Learning to use dried rice noodles for cooking
Advance Thai cooking skill with learning how to cook variety of Pad Thai recipes

items.title: Effortless Artisan Breads
items.headline: Expert, time-saving strategies for genuine, artisan sourdough & yeasted breads.  It's superfast breadband!
objectives_summary: 6 expert schedules for hassle-free, time-saving baking.
13  tried and tested recipes - an artisan baker's dozen!
Mix ONCE and bake twice - or three, or four or more times a week.

Lots of tips and techniques related to cake baking

items.headline: Home Baking Basics; Tarts & Pound cake
objectives_summary: Learn how to confidently make the traditional French pâte sucrée dough from scratch and bake with yummy fillings.
Learn two different luscious pound cake recipes, one sweet and one savory.
Access to recipes with photos of completed desserts and videos with full step-by-instructions for every dessert

items.title: Sourdough Croissants
items.headline: Lets Bake some Croissants, bi colour dough
objectives_summary: Be able to bake wonderful croissants by the end of the course

items.title: Food Dehydrating 101 -  in case of a 9-1-1 Food Emergency!

visible_instructors.job_title: Website and Course Creator + Copywriter + Ex-Drinker ;-)
visible_instructors.name: Susan
visible_instructors.title: Susan Gast

items.headline: Never Run Out of Food! Learn all you need to know in ONE hour!  Do it NOW so you don't go hungry when the "poop HTF".
objectives_summary: Students will be able to feed their family during tough times by learning how to safely dehydrate food for long-term food storage.
Know how to dehydrate fresh fruits and vegetables.
See what equipment is necessary - and it’s not a lot!
